name: City Truck Racing - eXtreme Realistic Drift Racer Edition
name_original: City Truck Racing - eXtreme Realistic Drift Racer Edition
description:
Get ready for a city truck race where you get to race through city streets top at top speed!

Don't think just because you're an experience drift racer that you will have an edge. This is pure city truck racing at its core! So jump into your truck and get ready for a absolute thrill ride!

FEATURES

- Ultra realistic 3D environments.
- Cool sound tracks.
- Easy controls!
